text: Abu Bakr Ibn Sayyid al-Nās was a theologian from Andalusia (Spain). He was born in 1200Franz Rosenthal, Ibn Sayyid al-Nās . Encyclopaedia of Islam, 2nd ed. Ed. P. Bearman, Th. Bianquis, C.E. Bosworth, E. van Donzel and W.P. Heinrichs. Brill Online. Accessed 30 October 2013. in Seville.Camilla Adang, "Zahiris of Almohad Times." Taken from Biografias Almohades, pg. 465. Eds. Maria Luisa Avila and Maribel Fierro. Part of Estudios Onomastico-Biograficos de Al-Andalus, vol. X. Madrid-Granada: Spanish National Research Council, 2000. == References == Category:1200 births Category:1261 deaths Category:Andalusian Muslims
title: Abu Bakr Ibn Sayyid al-Nās
